paragraphs: By decree of Primate Artorius and the holy will of Akatosh, all Red Sails pirates who abandon their criminal ways and pledge their souls to the Dragon God of Time shall receive full and unconditional pardons for all past trespasses, real and imagined.
The Order of the Hour welcomes such individuals into its sacred fellowship. New initiations take place regularly in the Enclave of the Hourglass until all available pardons have been distributed.
Hurry! The Order needs you. And your eternal redemption depends on it.
